mapper.select: SELECT count(0) FROM ( SELECT sbe.PriPID FROM sm_bus_entarchives sbe INNER JOIN cs_pub_otherpunish cpo ON sbe.PriPID = cpo.PriPID where sbe.setDeptCode like '${_parameter}%' UNION SELECT sbe.PriPID FROM sm_bus_entarchives sbe INNER JOIN cs_mid_caseinfo cmc ON cmc.PriPID = sbe.PriPID where sbe.setDeptCode like '${_parameter}%' ) t

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(cpo.pripid)) FROM cs_pub_opanomaly cpo, sm_bus_entarchives sbe WHERE cpo.PriPID = sbe.PriPID AND sbe.setDeptCode like '${_parameter}%' AND cpo.AuditState = '1' AND cpo.BusExcList NOT IN ( SELECT H.BusExcList FROM cs_pub_opadetail H WHERE H.AuditState = '1' )

SELECT count(DISTINCT sbe.PriPID ) FROM sm_bus_entarchives sbe INNER JOIN sm_baseinfo sb ON sb.PriPID = sbe.PriPID AND sb.IsSment = '0' INNER JOIN cs_yr_asset cya ON sb.PriPID = cya.PriPID AND cya. YEAR = (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') + 0 ) -1 INNER JOIN cs_yr_asset cya2 ON cya2.PriPID = cya.PriPID AND cya2. YEAR = (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') + 0 ) -2 WHERE cya.VendInc > cya2.VendInc AND sbe.setDeptCode like '${_parameter}%'

SELECT count(DISTINCT sbe.PriPID) FROM sm_bus_entarchives sbe INNER JOIN cs_yr_asset cya ON sbe.PriPID = cya.PriPID AND cya. YEAR = (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') + 0 ) -1 INNER JOIN cs_yr_asset cya2 ON cya2.PriPID = cya.PriPID AND cya2. YEAR = (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') + 0 ) -2 WHERE sbe.setDeptCode LIKE '${_parameter}%'
AND (
(cya.VendInc - cya2.VendInc) / cya2.VendInc < - 0.20 OR (cya.ProGro - cya2.ProGro) / cya2.ProGro < - 0.20 OR (cya.RatGro - cya2.RatGro) / cya2.RatGro < - 0.20
)

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN CultivationTypeCode = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) CultivationTypeCode1, SUM(CASE WHEN CultivationTypeCode = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) CultivationTypeCode2, SUM(CASE WHEN CultivationTypeCode = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) CultivationTypeCode3 FROM sm_bus_entarchives t

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN (Tsxz IS NOT NULL AND Tsxz !='' )THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) TsxzCount, SUM(CASE WHEN (Zckj IS NOT NULL AND Zckj !='') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ZckjCount, SUM(CASE WHEN (Kjfhy IS NOT NULL AND Kjfhy !='' )THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) KjfhyCount, SUM(CASE WHEN (Kjdsy IS NOT NULL AND Kjdsy !='') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) KjdsyCount, SUM(CASE WHEN (Xwqyy IS NOT NULL AND Xwqyy !='') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) XwqyyCount, SUM(CASE WHEN (Qt IS NOT NULL AND Qt !='') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QtCount, SUM(CASE WHEN (Tsxz !='' OR Zckj !='' OR Kjfhy !='' OR Kjdsy !='' OR Qt !='' ) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) WxzCount FROM sm_bus_entarchives t

select sum(case when (FIND_IN_SET('1',IndustryType) >0) then 1 else 0 end) industryType1, SUM(CASE WHEN (FIND_IN_SET('2',IndustryType) >0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) industryType2, SUM(CASE WHEN (FIND_IN_SET('3',IndustryType) >0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) industryType3, SUM(CASE WHEN (FIND_IN_SET('4',IndustryType) >0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) industryType4, SUM(CASE WHEN (FIND_IN_SET('5',IndustryType) >0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) industryType5, SUM(CASE WHEN (FIND_IN_SET('6',IndustryType) >0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) industryType6, SUM(CASE WHEN (FIND_IN_SET('7',IndustryType) >0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) industryType7, SUM(CASE WHEN (FIND_IN_SET('8',IndustryType) >0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) industryType8, sum(case when t.IndustryType is null then 1 else 0 END) industryType9 from sm_bus_entarchives t

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN (FIND_IN_SET('1',EntCrowdCode) >0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) entCrowdCode1, SUM(CASE WHEN (FIND_IN_SET('2',EntCrowdCode) >0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) entCrowdCode2, SUM(CASE WHEN (FIND_IN_SET('3',EntCrowdCode) >0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) entCrowdCode3, SUM(CASE WHEN (FIND_IN_SET('5',EntCrowdCode) >0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) entCrowdCode4, SUM(CASE WHEN (FIND_IN_SET('6',EntCrowdCode) >0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) entCrowdCode5, SUM(CASE WHEN (FIND_IN_SET('7',EntCrowdCode) >0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) entCrowdCode6, SUM(CASE WHEN (FIND_IN_SET('4',EntCrowdCode) >0) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) entCrowdCode7, SUM(CASE WHEN t.EntCrowdCode IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) entCrowdCode8 FROM sm_bus_entarchives t

SELECT YEAR,ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(b.VendInc,0)),0) VendInc,ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(b.ProGro,0)),0) ProGro,ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(b.RatGro,0)),0) RatGro FROM sm_bus_entarchives t LEFT JOIN cs_baseinfo b ON t.pripid = b.PriPID WHERE YEAR IS NOT NULL GROUP BY YEAR
